name: Kist Tomato Sauce
description: The bright red luscious tomatoes used give this sauce its natural red colour and fresh pure taste of tomatoes. It has no added flavours or colours. Compliments fried savories, french fries, fried rice, Pasta dishes and is a perfect ingredient to use in preparation of various dishes. It uplifts every dish and and is a children's favourite. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
